flawed_nl_solution:
When Trevor is 11, his older brother will be 11 x 3 = <<11*3=33>>33 years old.
Trevor’s older brother is 20 - 11 = <<20-11=9>>9 years older than Trevor.
Since Trevor is 9 years younger, Trevor will be 33 - 9 = <<33-9=23>>23 years old.
#### 23

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 23. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
